sen.j: 石川 石足（いしかわ の いわたり、667年(天智天皇6年)－729年(天平元年））は飛鳥時代後期から奈良時代初期の貴族。
sen.e: ISHIKAWA no Iwatari (born in 667 and died in 729) was a man of noble ancestry from the late Asuka period to the early Nara period.
ISHIKAWA no Iwatari (born in 667 and died in 729) was a man of noble ancestry from the late Asuka period to the early Nara period.
ISHIKAWA no Iwatari (born in 667 and died in 729) was a man of noble ancestry from the late Asuka period to the early Nara period.
He was a great-great-grandson of SOGA no Umako.
He was a great-great-grandson of SOGA no Umako.
He was a great-great-grandson of SOGA no Umako.

sen.j: 少納言蘇我安麻呂の子。
sen.e: He was a son of Shonagon (minor councilor of state), SOGA no Yasumaro.
He was a son of Shonagon (minor councilor of state), SOGA no Yasumaro.
He was a son of Shonagon (minor councilor of state), SOGA no Yasumaro.
His official rank was Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank), Sangi (councilor).
His official rank was Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank), Sangi (councilor).
His official rank was Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank), Sangi (councilor).
In 686, he received the name, ISHIKAWA Ason (the second highest of the eight hereditary titles).
In 686, he received the name, ISHIKAWA Ason (the second highest of the eight hereditary titles).
In 686, he received the name, ISHIKAWA Ason (the second highest of the eight hereditary titles).

sen.j: 伯母の娼子はその直後頭角を現してきた藤原不比等に嫁ぎ、4人の息子を設けていた。
sen.e: His aunt, Shoshi married FUJIWARA no Fuhito who rose to prominence immediately after that and had four sons.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: His aunt, Shoshi married FUJIWARA no Fuhito who rose to prominence immediately after that and had four sons.
His aunt, Shoshi married FUJIWARA no Fuhito who rose to prominence immediately after that and had four sons.

sen.j: 4兄弟のうち、藤原武智麻呂・藤原房前・藤原宇合は石足の従兄弟にあたる。
sen.e: Among her sons, FUJIWARA no Muchimaro, FUJIWARA no Fusasaki, FUJIWARA no Umakai were his cousins.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Among her sons, FUJIWARA no Muchimaro, FUJIWARA no Fusasaki, FUJIWARA no Umakai were his cousins.
Among her sons, FUJIWARA no Muchimaro, FUJIWARA no Fusasaki, FUJIWARA no Umakai were his cousins.

sen.j: その為、藤原四子政権成立にあたっては彼らと協力してその政権確立を助けた。
sen.e: Therefore, he helped them establish the administration controlled by four brothers of the Fujiwara clan.
Therefore, he helped them establish the administration controlled by four brothers of the Fujiwara clan.
Therefore, he helped them establish the administration controlled by four brothers of the Fujiwara clan.

sen.j: 事実、長屋王の変に際しては、使者として長屋王邸に赴く等関与した。
sen.e: In fact, in the event of Nagayao no hen (Conspiracy of Nagayao), he played a role in visiting Nagayao's residence as a messenger.
In fact, in the event of Nagayao no hen (Conspiracy of Nagayao), he visited Nagayao's residence as a messenger.
sen.cmt: played a role in visitingは不自然と思われます。
sen.e: In fact, in the event of Nagayao no hen (Conspiracy of Nagayao), he visited Nagayao's residence as a messenger.

sen.j: しかしながら、既に蘇我氏自体が乙巳の変や壬申の乱に巻き込まれて、かつての栄光を失っていた。
sen.e: However, the glory of the Soga clan had already faded because of Isshi no hen (the assassination of Soga no Iruka to eliminate the Soga clan) and Jinshin War.
However, the glory of the Soga clan had already faded because of involvement in Isshi no hen (the assassination of Soga no Iruka to eliminate the Soga clan) and Jinshin War.
sen.cmt: 「巻き込まれて」を修正しました。
sen.e: However, the glory of the Soga clan had already faded because of involvement in Isshi no hen (the assassination of Soga no Iruka to eliminate the Soga clan) and Jinshin War.

sen.j: そのため、初叙からして既に41歳の時（正五位上）と大変遅かった。
sen.e: So, he received the first official rank, Shogoinojo (Senior Fifith Rank) at the age of 41, which was very late.
So, it was as late as the age of 41 when he received the first official rank Shogoinojo (Senior Fifith Rank).
sen.cmt: 前後関係がわかりにくかったので修正しました。
sen.e: So, it was as late as the age of 41 when he received the first official rank Shogoinojo (Senior Fifith Rank).

sen.j: ようやく62歳にして従三位・権参議まで昇ったが、直後の8月9日に薨去した。
sen.e: After that, he finally rose to the official rank of Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank), Gon Sangi (deputy councilor) at the age of 62, but right after that, on September 10, he died.
sen.cmt: 8月9日を官歴の最後に出てくる内容に合わせて、グレゴリオ暦で9月10日としました。
sen.e: After that, he finally rose to the official rank of Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank), Gon Sangi (deputy councilor) at the age of 62, but he died on September 10 immediately after the promotion.
After that, he finally rose to the official rank of Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank), Gon Sangi (deputy councilor) at the age of 62, but he died on September 10 immediately after the promotion.

sen.j: その後、石川氏はしばらくは中流貴族として、その命脈を保つ事になる。
sen.e: Afterward, the Ishikawa clan survived as the middle noble class for some time
Afterward, the Ishikawa clan survived as the middle noble class for some time
Afterward, the Ishikawa clan survived as the middle noble class for some time
